README:
Suite of programs for calculations using the Vibron Model (2DVM).

Used in the paper arXiv:1506.06765 [cond-mat.stat-mech]

by Currix TM

Programs

vibron_u4_u3_energies	:: Eigenvalues and (if needed) eigenvectors of the U(4) vibron model Hamiltonian using a U(3) basis.

vibron_u4_so4_energies  :: Eigenvalues and (if needed) eigenvectors of the U(4) vibron model Hamiltonian using a SO(4) basis.

vibron_u4_u3_ipr	:: Inverse Participation Ratio for eigenvectors of the vibron model Hamiltonian using the U(3) basis.

vibron_u4_so4_ipr	:: Inverse Participation Ratio for eigenvectors of the vibron model Hamiltonian using the SO(4) basis.

observables_U4_mh	:: Perl script to automate the calculation of several quantities for a simple U(4) model Hamiltonian.


Required Libraries 	:: lapack95

The program user's guide will be found in the doc directory in pdf, html, and txt formats (ToDo).
